website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech C510 HD Webcam is an inexpensive solution for computers that don't come with built-in cameras. Its 2-megapixel sensor takes 8-megapixel snapshots, and 720p HD video performs well with video-chatting programs like Skype, Google Chat, and Windows Live Messenger. With a handful of extra features like one-click uploads to YouTube or Facebook and fun video effects, the Logitech HD Webcam C510 is a worthwhile buy.
pros: "RightLight" sensor and "RightSound" microphone feature boosts clarity and automatically adjusts for best lighting
clever video effects enhance fun factor
cons: Video quality gets choppy at higher resolutions on slower systems

customer_reviews.title: 720p it is a great webcam
customer_reviews.text: If you don't get a 1080p webcam or don't want to spend a lot on one, then this is the best option. Recommended if you want HD but you don't want to go overboard on a webcam. I will be using this webcam soon for my YouTube channel (Bryanwny) for reaction gaming type videos. Webcam is pretty much in sync with my recording software. At best it might be off 0.5-1 sec but hardly noticeable. If you not getting a 1080p webcam but still want something good and in HD, get this webcam.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, got my parents one of these, too!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for Skype calls. Great look and feel, too. Mounts easily on the top of the screen, though lacks any "clams". Works best when you don't need to fix it in one place, though it's not flimsy at all. Highly adjustable - vertically and horizontally. Works under Linux - I personally got it to work under Raspberry Pi with V4L2 API, though the highest resolution I tried there was only 640x480 and it was already too much for that little board. It may support higher res, I just haven't tried it. The orange light gives a good idea of when the camera is filming and when it's not.
customer_reviews.author: George Kovalev

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. However, you still need to be careful with your lighting, despite it's "perfect-light" adjustment functionality. If you're using it in a dimly lit room, or your light source is illuminating something behind you, you'll find you may need to manually adjust the white levels, etc., to get a good capture.
customer_reviews.author: Xomby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Webcam!
customer_reviews.text: The camera does what it is supposed to do and is currently being used to make videos on YouTube. The audio is not the best, and the mic is not that great, but overall it is a good came that is very functional (minus one star for the not-so-great audio and mic). It also can take still pictures, which for me came in very handy when a monitor used started to go, and it allowed me to take pictures of that monitor to show the problem in order to get a replacement! Overall, a very good cam for the money. Also got the webcam from the supplier with super quick shipping, far beyond the level paid for!
customer_reviews.author: Walt Gekko

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Go with Sony VAIO
customer_reviews.text: My wife needed a new webcam for her Sony VAIO which had to be compatible with Skype and YIM. I checked around for a compatible camera and found this one. First, the picture is stunning. At 720P, you can see almost every facial detail in video calls. Throw away your old webcam if you have one that's not HD. Its pretty much worthless. Second, it's very compact and easy to put away. No pointy nubs after folding away and the lens is well protected. For the pricepoint, it is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love this little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera! It worked straight out of the box, and the software that comes with it is very handy! The video quality is excellent. The HD definitely doesn't hide anything, which means if I am not wearing makeup, I am not going on video! I use this for video conferencing, Skype, and to record videos for my business coaching. Hasn't disappointed me yet! It also works well in lower light, decent color quality. I selected this one over other brands and other models because of the reviews, and because it was one of the more affordable HD webcams, and I cannot say I am unhappy. It's been a fantastic investment!
customer_reviews.author: CrunchyMom

customer_reviews.title: Logitech is the only tech company of any kind that I really talk about because their customer service is beyond amazing.
customer_reviews.text: It's logitech literally everything they have is reliable and if for some reason it is isn't they will 110% take care of you. Logitech is the only tech company of any kind that I really talk about because their customer service is beyond amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jalen

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this webcam to anyone who is on the road. I use to talk to my family. It was very easy to set up and use. I "found" some funny hats, faces & avatars that my kids love! I bought a webcam a couple years ago and took it back due to set up issues that drove me nuts for two days when I gave up. NOT the case here. Five minutes and I was working with Skype. The only thing I could think to change would be the material used to make the power cord. I would prefer a more flexible plastic to make it store easier. That's hardly a real negative though.
customer_reviews.author: sales rep

customer_reviews.title: great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: purchased this one for me and a C310 for my father. Mine produces much higher quality video than the C310 even though they both boast 720P HD resolution and there is only a few dollars difference in price. Both are plug and play. Leave the CD with software and drivers in the box. Works with skype and a couple other programs I have with zero hassle. Just plug it into an available USB port and you are ready to rock. Logitech makes great products and the C510 Webcam doesn't dissapoint for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Esox07

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have some more expensive logitech cameras that work very well. I thought I would give this lower cost one a try to see if I could save money. The camera works well and the picture is clear. It is different from the more expensive cameras though. It does not have the same range of adjustment. The camera is fine for a basic webcam. Those needing a higher resolution or larger ranges of adjustment should look at the higher end models.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Bad Memory
customer_reviews.text: My C510 seems to forget quite often. I am a Logitec customer and have been for a long time, like 40 years!!! I have to run the CD about every other time I use my C510. It seems to lose its mind? Does anyone have any suggestions as to what might be happening?? I am using it on my Gateway Desktop, circa 2003, Windows XP Home Edition 3, Updated 2 Gig. This was one (1) of my Amazon purchases, which by the way was the most inexpensive places to purchase this item. Bob from Fort Myers, Fl.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Webcam for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this webcam for my Mother-in-Law. I walked her thru the install from 150 miles away and in a matter of about 12 short minutes, we were chatting via our online provider. I recommend that if this product is for a novice computer user, that you install your Video Chat Provider service first (skype, oovoo, aim, etc.) This way, once you have installed this webcam, one can use it immediately. It's all easy when you read the instructions (just a clue for the men)! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Play - Great Quality on Skype
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with how easy it was to use this on Skype. Just plugged it in and there it was. I am running Windows 8. The quality difference between my inbuilt camera on my all-in-one desktop, and this Logitech is night and day. I have not tried the built in microphone... i just need the video portion. But so far, so good. Only thing I will say... this was not in retail packaging.
customer_reviews.author: gadget geek

customer_reviews.title: Bought for use with Skype
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my parents to Skype with their friends overseas. Installation was simple: insert disc, plug-in USB for webcam when prompt, go through prompts, and that's all. Video quality and sound quality were great (from the self window on Skype and was told from the far sites). Never had a complaint from far sites there was echo (speakers were within 12" of webcam and still no problem). I'm happy for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: Soarer

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this web cam as a gift for my sister because she had a very low quality one. I have been very pleased with how this web cam has improved my ability to see her and her children as we visit over the internet. It is not perfectly clear, but that may be due to our connection. However, it is dramatically better than her old one and it is a wonderful way for our children to be able to interact even when we are a long way from each other.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reading Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install (although it takes some time), excellent video quality, cleverly designed to be laptop-fittable as well as portable (you can transform the camera into a small box that you can carry inside a pouch that is also provided). The software also has a lot of funny video enhancements if you need them. After using this camera you won't be able to tolerate the awful vid quality that most built-in webcams provide :)
customer_reviews.author: dskrvk

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Logitech Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my son to use while taking classes on-line. So far he has used it for three months and we have no complaints. I found the camera to be even better than expected! I read as many reviews as I could before choosing this headset, both here on Amazon and at other sites. I would recommend this camera to anyone as it is well-worth the money. I have come to trust the Logitech brand and own quite a few of their products.
customer_reviews.author: MaryReade

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, wire connection issues.
customer_reviews.text: So I was really excited about this! However, I did have some troubles with this webcam. Although, it seems to disconnect whenever I move the wire a little too much, and it's bothersome. Also, while the quality is good -- but damn, it gives a lot to your face as well..I know it shouldn't be a problem but meh. It is however, pretty good if I don't move it, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: HanaTan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Linux
customer_reviews.text: We use Mint Linux 12 and were worried about getting a web cam to work out of the box for Skype. We could have gotten a cheaper one, but wanted to be able to see & here our daughter who is in France with her new boyfriend and didn't want to have to hassle with a lot of scripts or dependencies. This camera worked perfectly. Just plugged it in and had a video call with my son. Now if we can just get a hold of our daughter...
customer_reviews.author: Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I'm a streamer on twitch and it was time for a new webcam, so I went to this webcam because it's something that isn't overkill but it isnt a lowball. The quality of the video is great, the colors in the video are nice and balanced as well. I suggest this webcam to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Javin

customer_reviews.title: Great little Webcam, we'll worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can't beat this Webcam. I got a new laptop for Christmas and wheb u pulled up the camera I was horrified. I got this because I don't use my laptop camera regularly, but for the times I do I needed better quality. This would satisfy me even if I did use it regularly. It has a hundred times better picture than my laptop, and sound quality sounds OK so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for PC ok Camera for Mac
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera so that I could use Skype with my family and freinds. It works great on my PC and the picture and sound quality is excelent. When I plug it into my Mac it reads the camera and the mic however you can not download any of the other driver software or anything for the Mac so the extra features that come on the PC do not come on the Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: It really does do the job, especially for video. My problem I suppose is I own good DSLR cameras so I'm spoiled on quality. Those things are 18 megapixel. I'm not sure what this one is, seems like 2 at the most, maybe 1. So the images are grainy. But it is affordable so it's a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Donald James

customer_reviews.title: Webcam works great with Ubuntu Linux!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because several reviews indicated it works on Linux and this is the case on Ubuntu Linux for sure. All that was needed after unpacking was to plug it into a free USB port, set Pulseaudio to use its Mic and start a call on Skype! It was that easy. There is a good webcam program in the Ubuntu repository called Cheese, it works great with this webcam too.
customer_reviews.author: Dilton

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect, Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father and he had no trouble installing it on his computer (which runs Windows XP). The camera software has options to use the camera through Skype, Google Video Chat and some other options, it's a nice feature and makes it easy for the less computer literate to easily pick which program they would like to use. The picture quality is superb, and the face tracking feature works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty impressed with the meta pixel that this puts out. There is clear resolution for others to see you with. This product is not the top of the line, yet it does give out a decent zoom and is not blurry like other models that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ak

customer_reviews.title: ... two of these what can I say they work great and mount nicely on your computer monitor but you ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these what can I say they work great and mount nicely on your computer monitor but you do have to move the parts around to have them fit snugly since they are in a different configuration out of the box. good quality picture and sound.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: red yugo bandit
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this webcam. This is my first so I can't compare it with another one, but the clarity of the pictures and video's from this webcam are truly outstanding. And it was a "piece of cake" to hook up and get started as I am a total computer novice. With all the different brands and models there are available I really lucked out picking this particular one!!
customer_reviews.author: Red Yugo Bandit

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most expensive webcam I have bought, but it is well worth EVERY penny. The video is CRYSTAL CLEAR and the built in microphone is wonderful. I get constant compliments on how clear and clean I sound while on Skype, Ventrilo, Teamspeak, or any of my other VOIP clients. Seriously, get this, it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ObviouslyDull

customer_reviews.title: Ultra compatible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be part of my "go bag" of tech gear. I had done some research on compatibility with Linux and this got good mentions. This has worked with Skype on Windows 7 starter, on Facetime on OSX, and on Linux with various tools. That makes it uber-compatible in my book. This is a very handy thing to have and it comes with a nice little mesh bag for the camera and cable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Webcam
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 webcams to use as security cameras in conjunction with the iCam app for iPhone. They were easy to setup and work fine with USB extension cables so I could place in positions to observe patio doors. Ability to swivel and tilt assisted placement. I get great picture and sound over WiFi and 3G networks to my iPhone. I have also used this model at work for an inexpensive method to video conference between locations. Sound and picture quality even from a fairly large conference room is very good.
customer_reviews.author: TBP-Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Made Long Distance Relationship MUCH Easier
customer_reviews.text: Then boyfriend (now husband) and I each have one of these and we love it a lot! It's been durable and well worth the money! We put up with grainy and spotty image for a long time before seeking these out! We love them and I would def buy these again if we had to.
customer_reviews.author: Dew Drop

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: 2/28/14 I just got this model and did a skype session. I was impressed at the clarity and fluid motion(not choppy) of the frame rates. It's small and compact and folds away so it wont scratch the lens. I bought the new version of the 910C and will do a comparison in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Cat5Dookie

customer_reviews.title: Great webcam, but video-chat is not longer available.
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using this webcam to Skype with my daughter who is away at college. I was intrigued about using video-chat (w/o Skype) because another review had said how clear it was, and the clarity of the picture has been an issue with an earlier webcam (not by Logitech). However, when you try to use the video-chat feature, a pop-up message appears and informs you that Logitech no longer offers this feature (not since July, 2013), and you are urged to use Skype instead. For the money ($40), this is still a great deal, I believe.
customer_reviews.author: B. Branan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice webcam. the only thing I don't like about it is it zooms in a lot more than my last webcam but I'm pretty sure all HD cams are like that. But overall it's a good cam. I only use it for MSN when I chat on webcam with people and it's pretty nice, I'd recommend this to anyone who's looking for a new HD cam!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was told to get a web cam by my 80 year old father who is 2,000 miles away so that we could better converse across the country. He has had a rudimentary one for a long time, and I think I will get him one of these (Logitech C510) as an up-grade when I go visit him next month. This is my first web cam. For the price I thought that I would get something that gave a modest visual output, but I am pleasantly surprised at the resolution, color fidelity, low-light capability, and sound quality. Nice product. I shop carefully, and found that Amazon was the best source.
customer_reviews.author: HandyMan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for video chat online, especially when your counterpart can see so clearly behind you into your room and point things out. The little pouch, cable management strap, and rotating ability are nice bonuses. Logitech software isn't bad, except that nobody has an account, so you have to do that to use it.
customer_reviews.author: achao

customer_reviews.title: Great webcam for Android TV sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my Timing Power Android TV stick (see my other reviews). Not HD on Android though, because the "HD" is supposed to be done on your computer/pc with Logitech software that doesn't run (is not available) for Android. But and excellent value and a great cam with a good quality microphone. We use this to Skype while sitting about 7-8 feet away on a sofa and have not had any issues with the other party not being able to hear us while we talk in our normal voices.
customer_reviews.author: SAS

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: My parents are missionaries and wanted to Skype with our kids. Our old camera was making them crazy because the picture was so grainy and small. This is a nice wide clear picture even in dim light, and the built in microphone works fantastic. It has improved our Skype experience dramatically and even comes with its own little case. :)
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera. It fits perfect on my tv screen! We have used it alot and it continues to work without issues for skype and MSN messenger. The software is fun too and alows funny faces and object on the screen. There is also a mic on it, which is what we really wanted with a camera. Overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jedadoo

customer_reviews.title: You have what you paid...
customer_reviews.text: Good camera no hassles good image and sound perfect. Tried the cheap Chinese cameras (aprox. 10 dollars) I ended screaming and people reported poor sound, poor video, but with this Logitech camera... is another world! Detects a whisper, follows your face, and in high definition. I fully recommend this camera, you will be not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good value for good product
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and more. The video quality is excellent and I've had people on Skype comment on the good quality. The microphone isn't the best, but I haven't heard anybody complain to me about the audio quality and it works just fine for video calls. Although I wouldn't rely on it for hi-def recording or anything. The mount was tricky to get set up on my monitor, but I thing that's just because the back of my monitor is slightly curved.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great HD Webcam
customer_reviews.text: The Logitec C510 works like a charm on my windows pc. It has great video quality provided you have sufficient lighting. I didn't need the installation disk to get it working but it's probably best to use it anyways. The only problems i've had with it are that it doesn't work with my Macbook Pro all i get is a black screen for my video preview but i just use the built in camera so that's no big deal. Overall if you wan't a good webcam without spending a whole lot of money this is definitely a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: This cam is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a cam to keep an eye on my dog, so I attached it to the top of my dresser mirror to get a nice "looking down" point of view. The camera tilts and swivels perfectly with ease, and the picture comes out BEAUTIFUL! Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this webcam. I did a lot of research before buying a webcam and this one came out on top, based on the other reviews I saw here. It sits on my monitor really nicely while still being very adjustable, it's very high-def, and it comes with a great carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: michosa

customer_reviews.title: Logitech knows their stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent webcam. If you take it apart, you can even configure the focus. Great quality for the value. I use this to film and stream my Pokemon games; it runs great with my broadcasting software, and no woes were involved with setting it up. The audio quality is also a lot better than I thought. Of course, you get nothing professional out of this, but the quality still greatly pleases me and definitely beats the competition in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Brandl

customer_reviews.title: satisfied but no pleased
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, served the purpose. Doesn't sit well on the screen and I'm always having to adjust in the middle of a conversation but it will dol I'm not buying another one. Next time I'll buy a monitor with the cam built into it.
customer_reviews.author: Wort1958

customer_reviews.title: Caution: software has bugs and model breaks
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most reviews, this comes after having the C510 for two months. The software had plenty of bugs from the start, and is excruciatingly slow! It cost me several hours to troubleshoot the software, install new drivers, and try a bunch of (better) online free webcam software. Not worth it. After two months, it finally stopped working. It went out in this week's garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a versatile video camera that could be moved, directed and utilized for a number of needs with our part-time businesses. We own a "VEMMA" business and a fantastic system for learning the piano called "Simply Music"! This camera has produced great results and will be a definite asset!
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Good webcam!
customer_reviews.text: Bought about five years ago or more, and daughter is still using it right now. Not a heavy user, but it has been through a lot of Windows versions with no fuss. Works great still!
customer_reviews.author: Herz aus Metal

customer_reviews.title: Logitech 720p Webcam C510 No Software
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a problem with electronics ordered from Amazon. However, I received my Webcam in a box with no directions and software. You can find this information on the Logitech site but I believe the supplier should have provided when purchased. I am not able to let everyone know what I think of the webcam's performance until I find directions and software. Usually I am very pleased with Amazon and their suppliers. However, in this instance they need to look at the provider and check on where they are getting these webcams.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B. Mello

customer_reviews.title: Good webcam
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Easy to use. The only drawback is there's no "mirror view" for this webcam. Other than that, 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Cresus McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Logitech HD Webcam C510
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the webcam as a gift for my wife. The software loaded with no issues. Now she can see the Grandkids any time she wants. There is an issue with using it on a desktop monitor even though it's a flatscreen. It's obviously designed to use with laptops. Other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wester of  Mesquite

customer_reviews.title: Can U See Me Now?
customer_reviews.text: This camera rocks! It was worth every penny for sure! The picture is very crisp and the sound works great too. Its nice to have around. My daughters use it to video chat with their dad. It makes for a better "phone call" experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket webcam
customer_reviews.text: Super portable easy plug n play webcam. I love this thing. I brought this little guy through two deployments. Its scratched and scarred but still works great. For 50 bucks? a little steep I think. But hey, I highly recommend to anyone who wants a great webcam.
customer_reviews.author: Luky_shot

customer_reviews.title: Very nice qiuality.
customer_reviews.text: Has been dependable from day one. I am still using it and I am quite satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace the one that my puppy chewed thru the cord (I had an older version of Logitech). So far this webcam is great. The picture & sound quality is all good. I use it a lot on Skype to talk to my family and friends. I will only buy logitech - for the price it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: great picture, great price
customer_reviews.text: I had an online interview to attend recently, so I needed to get one of these. I've never had one before, but now that I've got one, I've been playing around with it. It takes great pictures and video and has some nifty features to play around with. Works well with Skype.
customer_reviews.author: Corenaccio

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few dollars more and get good results.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad we went with the better/a little more expensive webcam vs. the cheaper models offered by the same company. This is our first webcam and we've been very happy with it and the different features it offers. It's worth the extra $20 to get a good produce rather than find out later we need to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawk Fan Julia

customer_reviews.title: Added this camera for SKYPE
customer_reviews.text: Great picture clarity. We learned how to SKYPE off of a newly purchased Kindle so we purchased this camera to let us use the bigger monitor of our desktop computers. Works great, so far no problems, easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Webcam that all can afford with Logitech quality
customer_reviews.text: Webcam that all can afford with Logitech quality I got one to test it out and then got more for my Dad and sister. Now everyone can have a video call with my family. I do keep it password protected so I am in control not the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle James

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Not much to add to previous reviews. It just seems unusual that a product comes out of the box with clear instructions on how to install, the installation works flawlessly, and the product works as advertised. First PC accessory in many years that didn't need some tweaking to make it work the way it was supposed to work. Good for you, Logitech! And good service from Amazon. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bigpyne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box for this webcam, I was VERY skeptical about whether the clamp would work, but it is ingenious engineering at it's best. I've used it on 2 different tv's, 2 different monitors, and 2 different laptops, using the same clamp. The video quality is amazing on Skype. It was pretty easy to set up and for the price, it was perfect for me. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants a higher quality webcam that could work in every situation.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ravitz

customer_reviews.title: Very good webcam!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to skype with my parents and I bought one for them. They are older adults and have a difficult time with computers and they figured how to use it and install it. That shows how easy it was for them. The only downside is that it does just sit on the laptop and if I move the laptop it can fall off. Since we only use it to skype it isn't really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3under3

customer_reviews.title: I like it for rotation capacity
customer_reviews.text: I like it for rotation capacity. But somehow it was difficult to attach it.
customer_reviews.author: Sushi2525

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I have Linux on my computer, so as usual, that complicated the instalment. Fortunately my bro is a computer geek and downloaded the appropriate 'drive'? But now that it's installed, I just sign in to Skype and chat with my hubby, who is in Afghanistan. He tells me that the picture is super clear and he's very impressed with it. Now I need to buy one to sent to him, because the one built into his laptop is horrible! I want to see the sparkle his eyes have, and I know this camera can deliver :)
customer_reviews.author: Army Wifey 2008

customer_reviews.title: FAST!
customer_reviews.text: I am a college student going away,so in that case I needed a webcam for personal things. My Gf recommended me this exact webcam. I was like sure why not so the estimated date was January-26-15 of course I'm like ugh ok I guess....but soon as I know I check my mail and it arrived sooner then I expected and they left a note saying we did for no extra charge. Webcam picture quality is just pitch perfect clean,video as well just perfect and clean thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Logitech C510 Webcam Review
customer_reviews.text: I have had only one chance to use my new webcam and liked it very much. My son which I used it with said the picture from my end was very good. My son also had a logitech webcam so it was very compatible. This is my first webcam and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very nice video camera
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Windows. Clamp must be taped to a surface, since it does not include a clamp. Lots of adjustments in software, if you need them.
customer_reviews.author: David Spector

customer_reviews.title: And I like it for the quality and how easy it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Logitech 720p Webcam C510 ...this has been used for a long time. And I like it for the quality and how easy it is to move around.
customer_reviews.author: LinL

customer_reviews.title: Logitech 720p Webcam C510
customer_reviews.text: I gave this webcam a 5 star rating because it was easy to setup and very easy to use.Now we can see our family members that live far away.Its amazing and we enjoy it.I highly recommended this model to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great HD Webcam
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. A better internet signal would ofcourse help, but I am currently working overseas and this product works really well. Sometimes the face tracker loses its mind, but the right light and the right sound feature are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sohaib Abbasi

customer_reviews.title: Great Cam for the price
customer_reviews.text: And, it was lots cheaper than Office Dep or Staples! Easy to install and was up and working in 10 minutes. The included "call" software is less intuitive than Skype, but a ready alternative if you don't use or like Skype. Good video and still shot quality, and the sound quality is great...from what I hear. :0)
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great little webcam
customer_reviews.text: We needed a compact webcam to use with Skype. This one fit the bill. Our video connection is great and everyone sees us clearly. It was easy to install as the instructions were very clearly written. It's just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: A. F. Harris

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, clarity, and durability. This camera is perfect for any web browsing needs and the picture is super clear for the price. I couldn't ask for much better even at a higher price point.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Logitech C510 Review
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to install and use. Our first experience was to use it on our Skype account with a company in Hong Kong. They reported that the visual was extremely good on their end. The only complaint I have is that the product was listed on Amazon at a reduced price and with a 15% discount. That was one of the reasons we chose this product. But it was only after placing the order and downloading the discount form did we see that the discount ran out 2 days before we placed the order. Consequently, our opinion of Amazon is not as high as the webcam from Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: fredptheo

customer_reviews.title: Great webcam
customer_reviews.text: I love this webcam. It has a very clear image quality and fun photo effects to use. I would recommend this to anyone who does not have a camera built into their computer/laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Lock

customer_reviews.title: Great webcam!
customer_reviews.text: I'm consistently pleased with the products I've purchased through Amazon, and this webcam is no exception. It's easy to install, and the tutorial provided by Logitech is quite comprehensive. Great picture quality and easy to use camera controls (zoom, panning etc.).
customer_reviews.author: J-Man

customer_reviews.title: GREAT webcam
customer_reviews.text: After looking at a lot of YouTube videos and finding out what webcams were used, this one by FAR had the sharpness down, and that's what I was looking for. It's an easy, awesome webcam....
customer_reviews.author: Terrrrri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed. It was a very good buy. And the product has performed exactly like I was hoping and expected. I highly recommend this product for anyone with similar needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole "Mickey" Maschke

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not the best I've seen. Not the worst. Definitely fair for the price I paid. I've had this camera for a couple of years now. It still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Chartier

customer_reviews.title: Love this webcam.  For the price, the quality is outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I regularly communicate with friends and family as well as co-workers over the internet. I wanted a webcam that could provide great quality video, and this little thing is just fantastic. There isn't anything I've seen for the price that can produce such great results. My only complaint: while I can use the cam on my Mac, it doesn't work with any of the software available for the cam - thus many features are not available, despite the quality being excellent
customer_reviews.author: Al G

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works great
customer_reviews.text: Has good picture quality and works great. Use it with Skype, because the webcam on my computer sucks. Logitech make good quality computer accessories and I wasn't disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F

customer_reviews.title: Clear picture. Perfect for Skyping your long distance lover.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I need a camera is to Skype my boyfriend in Australia. I needed one for my PC, and this fit tyne bill. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danyhawke

customer_reviews.title: I can see
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. In fact so goo now I want the better 1080i Cam...For the price it's fantastic but now i will sell it and buy the new one..But if you are on a budget and you only want to spend a few dollars more the the one you are thinking of replacing then this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I'm happy with the quality of picture as ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I'm happy with the quality of picture as well. Only reason for four stars is the way it sits on the computer. It kinda hangs there, wish it had a clip. Other than that great product for what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: cayla

customer_reviews.title: Great Video/Camera/Chat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera/video maker/video chat. The picture quality is good and the sound is great. It was easy to install and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Owlmaiden

customer_reviews.title: Works great and has a clear image and sound
customer_reviews.text: Works great and has a clear image and sound. Easy to install. Comes with NO Instructions, just plug it in to your computer and it will install itself...
customer_reviews.author: Ritchieart

customer_reviews.title: set up and very good pic and vid
customer_reviews.text: simple to use, set up and very good pic and vid quality
customer_reviews.author: Maui

customer_reviews.title: ThatGuy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Works in both Windows and Ubuntu ( which I am very pleased with) Quality is amazing, in fact you can't get much better without dishing out loads of money. Overall, considering the price and the quality of this product it is without a doubt a must buy. So stop reading reviews and debating over web camera's, and get this camera, okay? Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Augmented-Pony-With-Six-OOO's

customer_reviews.title: Webcam:
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked as needed and continues to serve me welI I would reccomend this to all that are interested. Robert
customer_reviews.author: Robert  G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! Of course, that's what I normally expect from Logitech. My dad had bought the C310, so I bought this one. GREAT HD picture!!
customer_reviews.author: F. D. Walz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 720 Hd Webcam!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Logitech c510 720p webcam! I purchased it to replace a crappy Microsoft LifeCam hd webcam. Its fixed focus but oh so sharp a video quality and the built in mic is not better than the MS Lifecam.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Henry

customer_reviews.title: compact, does the job
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for to fit into the small confines of my work area, preforms as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Plug it in with Windows 7 and it was immediately recognized and installed. Downloaded skype and was up and running in minutes. Great picture and sound quality for such a small device.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this for my mother and she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My mother was looking to Skype with family members abroad and was very happy I purchased this for her. I have Skyped with her as well and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Eggplant Pete

customer_reviews.title: Went bad after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: MODEL - C-510 .....This started out as a nice webcam, and it has 360 degrees radius to adjust. But that seems to be the problem, as i rotate the camera left to right, depending which computer i'm on....it finally started to cut me off skype when i touched the camera to rotate it. Works fine most of the time, but i bought a new one, because this one i could not depend on after 5 months. No warranty to replace this camera, even though it says 2 yr warranty.
customer_reviews.author: PWayne

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this webcam for my parents so they could Skype with the grandchildren. It was extremely easy to setup and the quality is great for their purposes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Logitech 720p Webcam C510
customer_reviews.text: This camera works lot better than the built in camera on laptop. Easy to install and work with. It was shipped promptly and I would buy from this seller again. Amazon is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Shaffee

customer_reviews.title: logitech 720P webcam
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this webcam. It is easy to use and produces a very good picture, (considering the subject!) It is so much more fun to talk to the grandchildren when we can see each other.
customer_reviews.author: Waffle Tutu

product_meta.title: Logitech 720p Webcam C510
product_meta.description:
The Logitech HD Webcam C510 - for portable HD video calling and recording. Enjoy smooth HD 720p video calls on your favorite IM or Logitech Vid HD. One-click Facebook or YouTube uploading.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


FEATURES



Hi-Def Yourself. Logitech HD Webcam C510
Say it bigger. Say it better. High definition video up to 720p, a wide-angle lens and autofocus for picture quality that's simply amazing. Video chat, blog, stream and upload to Facebook in just one click. The term 'webcam' doesn't quite do it justice. Logitech Fluid Crystal Technology gives you smooth, fluid video. Crystal clear images. Rich colors.

Image-Perfect Tuning: World-class optics, lighting compensation and image processing make your videos, video calls and photos more breathtaking.

Auto Everything: Automatic adjustments for brightness, contrast, color saturation, colors, focus and face tracking make high-quality video calling and recording a breeze.

Internet-Ready Camera: Camcorder-quality videos, digital camera-quality stills and studio-level sound make online video sharing and communications faster, easier and more beautiful.

HD Webcam C510
Noteworthy Features

• Portable HD 720p video in 16:9 widescreen • Stunning 8 MP photos • Easy HD video calling on Logitech Vid HD and most major IM services • 1-click video upload to Facebook and YouTube • Full-swivel camera lets you shoot at any angle • Built-in premium mic reduces background noise 
How to select an HD webcam




Self-expression knows no bounds. It's not just about video calls anymore.
Video blog, stream, share, rant, rap, sing and dance with ease. Quick one-click uploading to Facebook and YouTube. Seamlessly works with all your favorite applications.















COMPARE




Which Logitech HD Webcam is right for you?

Good Better Best What to look for HD Webcam C310 HD Webcam C510 Webcam C905 Webcam Pro 9000 QuickCam Orbit AF HD Pro Webcam C910 Video + Photo Quality HD resolution HD 720p HD 720p HD 720p HD 720p HD 720p Full HD 1080p 16:9 widescreen Photo resolution 5MP 8MP 8MP 8MP 8MP 10MP Focus type Always focused* Always focused* Premium Autofocus Premium Autofocus Premium Autofocus Premium Autofocus Lens type Plastic lens Plastic lens High-precision Carl Zeiss glass lens High-precision Carl Zeiss glass lens High-precision Carl Zeiss glass lens with motorized pan and tilt High-precision Carl Zeiss glass lens Auto light correction Audio Quality Built-in mic with noise cancellation Dual mics for stereo audio Special Features 1-click video upload to YouTube and Facebook Video effects Standard Premium Premium Premium Premium Premium 360-degree rotational camera Portable design Fold-and-go webcam plus carry case Carrying case Face Tracking Compatibility Works with Windows XP, Vista, 7 
*40 cm and beyond
feature_bullets: Fluid 720p HD video recording and video calling in 16:9 widescreen, and dazzling 8 MP photos
One-click upload to Facebook and YouTube
360° full motion rotational camera & fold-and-go portability
Auto light correction for dim and harsh lighting, and high-quality built-in noise-cancelling mic
Works with Logitech Vid HD, Skype, Yahoo Messenger, Microsoft Live Messenger
